segments.text: This kitchen is a complete mess of unnoticed problems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm watching the water flow endlessly from the sink onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can anyone be so completely oblivious to a literal flood in their own kitchen?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman just keeps drying her plate, as if nothing is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is soaking wet, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, her children are enacting a full-blown cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a stool that's about to collapse beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's risking a serious fall just for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is right there, encouraging him, waiting for her cut.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just one disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it incredibly frustrating to observe such a lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to step in and fix this.
segments.speaker: PAR
